1) Let 

$T: \mathbb{P}_{2} \rightarrow \mathbb{C}^{3}$, where $T(\mathbf{p})=\left[\begin{array}{c}p(1) \\ p(1) \\ p(1)\end{array}\right]$

What is the Kernel and Range? Is this an isomorphism?

2) Let 

$T: \mathbb{C}^{4} \rightarrow \mathbb{C}^{3}$, where $T(\mathbf{v})=\left[\begin{array}{c}v_1 \\ v_2 \\ v_4\end{array}\right]$

What is the Kernel and Range? Is this an isomorphism?

3) Let 

$T: \mathbb{P}_{2} \rightarrow \mathbb{C}^{3}$, where $T(a+bx+cx^2)=\left[\begin{array}{c}2a \\ a+b \\ c+b\end{array}\right]$

What is the Kernel and Range? Is this an isomorphism?
